
public class ControlStructers {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int a=70;
		if(a>=80) {
			System.out.println(" old");
		}else if(a>30 && a<80) {
			System.out.println("a is between 30 and 80");
		}else {
			System.out.println("a is 30 or yougage");
		}
	//
         String day="tuesday";
          switch(day) {
          case "monday":
        	  System.out.println("today is monday");
        	  break;
          case "tuesday":
        	  System.out.println("today is tuesday");
        	  break;
          case "wednesday":
        	  System.out.println("today is wednesday");
        	  break;
          }
	}

}
